<h3><a id="user-content-introduction" class="anchor" href="#introduction" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Introduction</h3>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-determinants-of-exchange-rate" class="anchor" href="#determinants-of-exchange-rate" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Determinants of exchange rate</h2>

<hr>

<h3><a id="user-content-economic-factors" class="anchor" href="#economic-factors" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a><strong>Economic factors</strong></h3>

<ul>
<li>Economic policy, controlled and set by government agencies and central banks. </li>
<li>Economic conditions, e.g., balance of trade, inflation, economic growth and health, productivity of an economy</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-political-conditions" class="anchor" href="#political-conditions" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a><strong>Political conditions</strong></h3>

<ul>
<li>Internal, regional, and international political circumstances and events, e.g., destabilization of the political situation in Ukraine can negatively affect the value of its currency.</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-market-psychology" class="anchor" href="#market-psychology" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a><strong>Market psychology</strong></h3>

<ul>
<li>Market psychology and trader perceptions, e.g., long-term trends, technical trading considerations, "Buy the rumor, sell the fact". </li>
</ul>

<p>--- .class #id </p>

<h3><a id="user-content-exchange-rate-visualization" class="anchor" href="#exchange-rate-visualization" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Exchange rate visualization</h3>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-can-i-predict-exchange-rates" class="anchor" href="#can-i-predict-exchange-rates" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Can I predict exchange rates?</h2>

<hr>

<h3><a id="user-content-let-us-check-this-shiny-app-on-exchange-rates" class="anchor" href="#let-us-check-this-shiny-app-on-exchange-rates" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a><strong>Let us check this <a href="http://berniepilgram.shinyapps.io/CourseProjects_FXRate/">Shiny App</a> on exchange rates</strong></h3>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># Preset variables for currency exchange rate calculations</span>
<span class="pl-c"># Load libraries required</span>
library(<span class="pl-smi">quantmod</span>); library(<span class="pl-smi">xts</span>)

<span class="pl-c"># Define variables</span>
<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>USD<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>; <span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>EUR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>; <span class="pl-smi">currencyA_value</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-c1">10000</span>; <span class="pl-smi">days_past</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-c1">50</span></pre></div>

<ul>
<li>Choose from a set of currencies you want to exchange and check how the currency exchange rate changes over time, for example: <code>r format(currencyA_value,big.mark=",",scientific=F)</code> USD -&gt; EUR at closing date <code>r format(Sys.Date()-1, format="%B %d, %Y")</code> and 
<code>r as.integer(days_past)</code> days prior.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># Create function for currency conversion using the getFX() function from the</span>
<span class="pl-c"># quantmod package. Output is a single conversion for a certain currency pair at day</span>
<span class="pl-en">FXconversion</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-smi">amount</span>,<span class="pl-smi">days</span>){
        <span class="pl-smi">currency_ratio</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> paste(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>/<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-v">sep</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
        <span class="pl-smi">FXrate</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> xts(get(getFX(<span class="pl-smi">currency_ratio</span>,<span class="pl-v">from</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> Sys.Date()<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-smi">days</span>,
                                <span class="pl-v">to</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> Sys.Date()<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-smi">days</span>)))
        <span class="pl-smi">amount_converted</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">amount</span><span class="pl-k">*</span><span class="pl-smi">FXrate</span>)
        <span class="pl-k">return</span>(<span class="pl-smi">amount_converted</span>)}

<span class="pl-c"># Create history of currency exchange rates or respectively exchanged currencies</span>
<span class="pl-en">FXhistory</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-smi">amount</span>,<span class="pl-smi">days</span>){
        <span class="pl-smi">currency_ratio</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> paste(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>/<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-v">sep</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
        <span class="pl-smi">FXrate</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> xts(get(getFX(<span class="pl-smi">currency_ratio</span>,<span class="pl-v">from</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> Sys.Date()<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-smi">days</span>,
                                <span class="pl-v">to</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> Sys.Date()<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>)))
        <span class="pl-smi">amount_history</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-smi">amount</span><span class="pl-k">*</span><span class="pl-smi">FXrate</span>
        <span class="pl-k">return</span>(<span class="pl-smi">amount_history</span>)}

<span class="pl-c"># Calculate amount exchanged</span>
<span class="pl-smi">currencyB_value_current</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> FXconversion(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyA_value</span>,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Calculate amount exchanged in the past</span>
<span class="pl-smi">currencyB_value_past</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> FXconversion(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyA_value</span>,<span class="pl-smi">days_past</span><span class="pl-k">+</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>)
<span class="pl-c"># Cacluate exchange rate over time</span>
<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> FXhistory(<span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyB</span>,<span class="pl-smi">currencyA_value</span>,<span class="pl-smi">days_past</span><span class="pl-k">+</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>)

<span class="pl-c"># Prepare for plot</span>
<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_tmp</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span>; <span class="pl-smi">index</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-c1">2</span><span class="pl-k">:</span>(length(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_tmp</span>)<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>); <span class="pl-smi">index</span>[<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]<span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>
<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time_line</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-smi">FX_over_tmp</span>[<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-smi">index</span>]
plot(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span>,<span class="pl-v">main</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Amount as Value of Currency over Time<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">ylab</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">currencyA</span>)
points(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span>[<span class="pl-c1">2</span>],<span class="pl-v">pch</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">19</span>); points(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span>[length(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time</span>)],<span class="pl-v">pch</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">19</span>)
lines(<span class="pl-smi">FX_over_time_line</span>,<span class="pl-v">pch</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">23</span>,<span class="pl-v">lty</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>,<span class="pl-v">col</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>red<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>); legend(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>topleft<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Current and past date<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,
       <span class="pl-v">pch</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">19</span>, <span class="pl-v">title</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Values at closing dates<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)</pre></div>

<h3><a id="user-content-ready-to-join-the-team" class="anchor" href="#ready-to-join-the-team" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Ready to join the team?</h3>

<p>--- &amp;radio</p>

<h3><a id="user-content-exchange-rates-over-time---are-you-ready-to-join-the-team" class="anchor" href="#exchange-rates-over-time---are-you-ready-to-join-the-team" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Exchange rates over time - Are you ready to join the team?</h3>

<hr>

<h3><a id="user-content-usdeur-exchange-rate-on-r-formatsysdate-days_past-1-formatb-d-y" class="anchor" href="#usdeur-exchange-rate-on-r-formatsysdate-days_past-1-formatb-d-y" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>USD/EUR exchange rate on <code>r format(Sys.Date()-days_past-1, format="%B %d, %Y")</code></h3>

<hr>

<p>How much money did you loose when you changed <code>r format(currencyA_value,big.mark=",",scientific=F)</code> USD to EUR on <code>r format(Sys.Date()-days_past-1, format="%B %d, %Y")</code> compared to closing date <code>r format(Sys.Date()-1, format="%B %d, %Y")</code>?</p>

<ol>
<li>100.01 USD</li>
<li><em><code>r as.double(currencyB_value_current)-as.double(currencyB_value_past)</code></em> USD</li>
<li>76.34 USD
*** .hint
Please check the previous slide!
*** .explanation
Are you ready to join the team?</li>
</ol>

<p>--- .class #id </p>

<h3><a id="user-content-research-project-and-capstone-project" class="anchor" href="#research-project-and-capstone-project" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Research Project and Capstone Project</h3>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-modeling-of-exchange-rate-behaviour" class="anchor" href="#modeling-of-exchange-rate-behaviour" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Modeling of exchange rate behaviour</h2>

<hr>

<h3><a id="user-content-1-review-of-current-theories-and-models" class="anchor" href="#1-review-of-current-theories-and-models" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>1. Review of current theories and models</h3>

<ul>
<li>International parity conditions, e.g., Relative Purchasing Power Parity</li>
<li>Balance of payments model, Asset market model, algorithmic trading models</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-2-development-of-an-exchange-rate-model" class="anchor" href="#2-development-of-an-exchange-rate-model" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>2. Development of an exchange-rate model</h3>

<ul>
<li>Regression analysis (linear, non-linear) of economic factors and variables to model economic factors, a combination of both classical and Bayesian models will be considered.<br></li>
<li>Strategic Reasoning to model (1) political conditions and (2) market psychology</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-3-deployment-of-model-at-webserver" class="anchor" href="#3-deployment-of-model-at-webserver" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>3. Deployment of model at webserver</h3>

<ul>
<li>User friendly setup: User can choose from a set of economic factors and variables, and from a set of decision points for Strategic Reasoning</li>
</ul>
</article>
